content: keep your lip balm from getting lost in your bag with this quick and easy crochet holder this simple pattern is perfect for beginners who want to practice basic stitches and learn how to work in joined rounds to create a seamless tube this project works up fast making it ideal for using up scrap yarn you can easily customize it to fit any size lip balm and add a personalized touch to your keys purse or backpack materials * yarn any sport or dk weight yarn yarn scraps are perfect for this * hook a hook size that works with your chosen yarn e g 2 5 mm or 3 mm * scissors * yarn needle skills needed * magic_ring magic_ring * chain chain * single_crochet single_crochet * increase increase * slip_stitch slip_stitch the pattern includes two versions a detailed step-by-step tutorial with photos for beginners and a shortened version for experienced crocheters it s a fun and functional project that you ll love making again and again
